name: Breakout Game (Joker Gaming from Game Gen)
name_original: Breakout Game (Joker Gaming from Game Gen)
description:
This is just a simple game of Breakout that I made that has 4 different color bricks also I made the colored bricks that looks like a mad face.

The controls to the game is simple

With Mouse click left on the platform to move left  click right on the platform to move right

On mobile tap left on the platform to move left  tap right on the platform to move right
